TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to setup vehicle fields in query builder screen.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on vehicle tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on vehicle tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on vehicle tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Field.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Field.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Field.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Query.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Query.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Query.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Value.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Vehicle tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Vehicle tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Vehicle tab.
